app.summary: America’s play-by-play audio leader. Home of the NFL, NHL, Olympic Games, March Madness, the Masters, NCAA football and more.
app.testingInstructions:
We have collaborated with the owner of this content to create and publish this skill.

The signed IP rights for the app can be downloaded at: https://go.xappmedia.com/Westwood-One/iprights 

You will be prompted to login in first. The username is "alexa.cert@xappmedia.com" and the password is "S&9jDq@9".

After successful login, the pdf should automatically download. If it does not download, then refresh https://go.xappmedia.com/Westwood-One/iprights or click the link on the page to try again.
app.name: Westwood One Sports (NHL, now Universal Version)
app.description:
America’s play-by-play audio leader. Home of the NFL, NHL, Olympic Games, March Madness, the Masters, NCAA football and more.

Once you've enabled the skill, you can say "Alexa, open westwood one sports“ to start listening.

outputSpeech.displayText: Bad news friend, that's teams bracket has been busted!
Thanks for tuning in to Westwood One's coverage.  We'll see you next time.
Thanks for tuning in to Westwood One Sports, take care folks.
Sorry, we aren't 100% sure which school you are looking for.  Try again but keep it simple to just the name of the university.

handlers.name: Conflict Resolution
utterancePatterns: {play the| play| the| listen to the|} {devil|wildcat|huskie|spartan|tiger|raider|bulldog|bulldog|owls|cougar|wolfpack|aggie|agg|ag|cat|crimson|raider|knight|bear|tiger|bearcat|jay|gael|eagle|golden eagle|panther|ram|mountaineer|cowboy|gamecock|bobcat|braves}{s|} {game|game please}
